subject: Thanks but that still doesn't tell me how to implement JUnit
msgSnippet: Do I write my JAVA code in the IDEA environment and implement that? The idea is to use JUnit for unit testing.  I read on one site where JUNit has a graphic
messageBody:
Do I write my JAVA code in the IDEA environment and implement that?
The idea is to use JUnit for unit testing. I read on one site where
JUNit has a graphic user interface for implementing the test code.

I don't find documentation on how to implement that.

Thank you, though, for responding. Eventually I'll piece together
all of the advice so that I can understand all of the pieces.
